## üîÑ Common Data Flow Patterns

### Pattern 1: Standard CRUD Flow

```
HTTP Request
    ‚Üì
Controller (validates, delegates)
    ‚Üì injects
Service (business logic)
    ‚Üì uses
Repository (data access)
    ‚Üì queries
Model (Eloquent ORM)
    ‚Üì interacts with (via RLS)
Database Table
```

### Pattern 2: Platform Integration Flow

```
Controller
    ‚Üì injects
Platform Service
    ‚Üì uses
Platform Connector (Meta/Google/TikTok)
    ‚Üì calls
External Platform API
    ‚Üì stores result via
Repository ‚Üí Model ‚Üí Database
```

### Pattern 3: AI/Embedding Flow

```
Service (Campaign, Content, etc.)
    ‚Üì dispatches
EmbeddingOrchestrator
    ‚Üì calls
Google Gemini API
    ‚Üì stores vector in
pgvector (cmis_ai.embeddings)
```

## üîç Discovery Commands

*Use these commands to discover service layer connections:*

### Find All Services

```bash
find app/Services -name '*.php' -type f
```

### Find All Repositories

```bash
find app/Repositories -name '*.php' -type f
```

### Find Controllers Using ApiResponse

```bash
grep -r "use ApiResponse" app/Http/Controllers | wc -l
```

### Find Service Dependencies

```bash
grep -A 10 "__construct" app/Services/*.php
```

### Find External API Calls

```bash
grep -r "Http::\|Guzzle\|curl_" app/Services
```
